snippet.title: Ever Oasis - Game Trailer - Nintendo E3 2017
snippet.description:
The newest game from Koichi Ishii, the creator of the Mana series. The desert’s last safe haven is a lone oasis you call home. Draw a line in the sand and fight to protect it with the help of the water spirit Esna. Ever Oasis is Available Now!

Learn more about Ever Oasis! https://goo.gl/mYYV7e

Follow Nintendo E3 Coverage! http://e3.nintendo.com

#Nintendo3DS #EverOasis #E32017

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com
